name: Adventures Of Harambe
description:
You play as Harambe. You must avoid the guns of the zookeepers and keep Harambe alive for as long as possible.

Controls:

Tap to jump, keep jumping between the guns for as long as possible.

Good luck!

PS: This is my first ever attempt at making a game and it was made in a short period of time, so please consider this when playing! I appreciate all support and feedback.

Also, the game is 100% free but if you wish to support me and help me develop better games, then feel free to pay a small fee for the game if you so wish. Once again this is not necessary, but I really appreciate anybody who does! Thank you and have fun :)
